discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Its B as the last sentence on screenshot only appear if you choose continuous availability.

An administrator is planning the size of a new vRealize Operations Manager (vROps) platform using the vROps sizing tool. The output of different configurations and sizing information from the tool were modeled for internal design discussion.
Refer to the exhibit:
//IMG//

Which configuration was sized?

An administrator is creating a new alert definition. It was decided that this new alert should affect the Risk badge of an object when triggered.
Which setting should be configured by the administrator to achieve this goal?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Guys are correct its A-Impact

Selected Answer: A
Impact dropdown has option for Health, Risk & efficiency
Correct answer is A. Impact dropdown has option for Health, Risk & efficiency

choices.A: Manually take the cluster offline, and then select Rollback Installation.
choices.D: Manually bring the cluster online, and then select Finish Installation.
choices.B: Manually bring the cluster online, and then select Rollback Installation.
choices.C: Manually take the cluster offline, and then select Finish Installation.

questions.question_text:
During an upgrade of the vRealize Operations cluster via the Administration UI, the cluster has failed, and the status has changed to offline.
Which remediation strategy should be used to manage this problem and continue the installation process?

discussion.content: I would Prefer D because cluster is already offline.

Selected Answer: C
C - If a cluster fails and the status changes to offline during the installation process of a PAK file update then some nodes become unavailable. To fix this, you can access the Administrator interface and manually take the cluster offline and click Finish Installation to continue the installation process.

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of the self-provider option within the dashboard definition?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is the correct answer - https://docs.vmware.com/en/vRealize-Operations/8.10/com.vmware.vcom.core.doc/GUID-CE3ADE4E-0063-4B7B-A1A2-A3B9F616A3E3.html

choices.B: It can create a custom set of metrics to support widgets with meaningful data.
choices.A: If Refresh Content is enabled, it will specify how often to refresh the data in the widget display.
choices.D: It indicates whether objects appearing in the widget are defined in the widget or are provided by another widget source.
choices.C: It enables or disables the automatic refreshing of the data in the widget display.

choices.B: Cost options for increasing cluster capacity with additional hosts
choices.A: Cost comparisons for running in hybrid/private/public cloud
